characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: The Dude communicates in a friendly, supportive manner that makes others feel at ease.

options.description: Tries to cut through the noise and get straight to the point.
Pays close attention to tone and body language to convey complex emotions.

characteristics.name: Creative Approach
characteristics.description: The Dude approaches problems with a creative, out-of-the-box thinking style.

options.description: Favors breaking down complex issues into smaller parts.

characteristics.name: Sense of Humor
characteristics.description: The Dude has a dry, sarcastic sense of humor that can catch others off guard.

options.description: Uses quick, clever wordplay to defuse tense situations.
Approaches humor with a more subtle, understated style.

characteristics.name: Emotional Intelligence
characteristics.description: The Dude is highly attuned to the emotions of those around him.

options.description: Can put themselves in others' shoes and understand their feelings.
Maintains a level of emotional detachment when needed.

characteristics.name: Risk-Taking
characteristics.description: The Dude is willing to take calculated risks to pursue his creative goals.

options.description: Weighs the pros and cons before making a decision.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: The Dude is comfortable in social situations and can navigate complex group interactions.

options.description: Engages easily with others and forms connections quickly.
Puts boundaries around themselves to maintain a sense of self.

characteristics.name: Curiosity
characteristics.description: The Dude is driven by curiosity and a desire to learn new things.

options.description: Breaks down complex systems to identify patterns.

characteristics.name: Perseverance
characteristics.description: The Dude is determined and resilient in the face of challenges.

options.description: Keeps working towards a goal even when faced with obstacles.
Adapts to changing circumstances without losing focus.
